name: Smiley Blocks - Paint Puzzles
description:
Second most popular puzzle game in the Japanese App Store! More than 200.000 players!

Smiley Blocks is a new type of colorful, cute and catchy puzzle game!

【Rules of the game】
▲ Fit the pieces perfectly into place.
▲ Place pieces in the same colored square.
▲ Pieces of the same color can never touch each other.

【Features】
▲ A free, fun puzzle gameplay!
▲ Easy to play, difficult to master.
▲ Cute and colorful graphics
▲ Play at your own pace,No time limit. No stress!
▲ 440 Free stages and an additional 80 paid stages.

Purchasing a paid stage will hide all ads except when you want to receive hints for solving a puzzle.
